entries.title: Free Kids Coloring Pages (Printable)
entries.meta_description: Generate safe printable kids coloring pages in seconds.
entries.intro: Create age-friendly line art with prompts and one-click export.
intro_paragraphs: Create age-friendly line art with prompts and one-click export.
entries.body: ColorfulMe helps parents and teachers generate printable coloring pages from text prompts with strict family-safe moderation. Download PNG and PDF instantly.
body_paragraphs: ColorfulMe helps parents and teachers generate printable coloring pages from text prompts with strict family-safe moderation. Download PNG and PDF instantly.

faq.question: Is this safe for kids?
faq.answer: Yes. Prompts are filtered with strict family-safe moderation.

faq.question: Can I print at home?
faq.answer: Yes, every page can be downloaded as PDF for printing.

entries.title: AI Coloring Page Generator Tool
entries.meta_description: Generate black-and-white coloring pages from any prompt.
entries.intro: Use this tool to convert ideas into clean line art.
intro_paragraphs: Use this tool to convert ideas into clean line art.
entries.body: Enter your prompt, choose style and aspect ratio, then generate, download, and print in seconds.
body_paragraphs: Enter your prompt, choose style and aspect ratio, then generate, download, and print in seconds.
entries.generation_seed_prompt: A friendly dinosaur in a park with balloons

faq.question: How many credits does text generation use?
Can I use this for classrooms?
faq.answer: Yes, it is built for home and classroom use.

entries.title: Cute Space Cat Coloring Page

intro_paragraphs: A ready-to-print coloring page for kids who love space and cats.

entries.title: How To Turn Photos Into Coloring Pages
entries.meta_description: Step-by-step guide to convert photos into printable coloring pages.
entries.h1: How To Turn Photos Into Coloring Pages
entries.intro: Learn how to convert your own photos into clean outlines.
intro_paragraphs: Learn how to convert your own photos into clean outlines.
entries.body: Use Photo mode in ColorfulMe to upload any image, automatically simplify edges, and export print-ready PDF pages in minutes.
body_paragraphs: Use Photo mode in ColorfulMe to upload any image, automatically simplify edges, and export print-ready PDF pages in minutes.
